Vajira Lasantha Thambawita

Vajira is a resech scientist at SimulaMet, Norway. He is from the computer engineering background. A thesis with the title "Cache Optimization techniques of GPGPUs" was completed for his master degree. He is currently working on a research project called Generative Adversarial Network in Medicine, which is targeting better cross-domain feature transfer mechanisms.Â  In addition to his main research project, he has completed severla dataset papers and deep learning method papers in the domain of medicine.
